titleStmt.title: The triall of a black-pudding. Or, The unlawfulness of eating blood proved by Scriptures, before the law, under the law, and after the law. By a well wisher to ancient truth.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, Thomas, 1607-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F:N. and are to be sold by John Hancock in Popes Head Alley,

notesStmt.note: A well wisher to ancient truth = Thomas Barlow. Cf. ESTC.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
